description: Researching interpretability and faithfulness of frontier reasoning models.
Employing "logitlens" view of transformers to analyze internal reasoning and decision making of LLM models
Engineering with openAI APIs to finetune, prompt, and collect sample data from Llama, Deepseek, Qwen, and OpenAI models.
Developed EEG signal processing pipeline to accurately detect seizure patterns in epileptic mice
Created and Fine-tuned SVM model to accurately classify mice seizures with 96% accuracy
Integrating state-of-the-art video analysis tools (DeepLabCut and Keypoint Moseq) to track and quantify behavioral patterns.
Develop full-stack LMS solutions for educators with React, Typescript, and Database Management Systems (Supabase).
Work closely with AI engineers to study how to implement and deploy LLM algorithms from scratch (Tensorflow).
Implemented RESTful APIs with prompt engineering techniques to utilize output from LLM models.
Optimized erythrocyte detection algorithm by 10% through layering the CLAHE model on the developmental UNet Model.
Developed computer vision model with the Pytorch and Keras framework to detect blood capillaries and cells.
Implemented Contrast Limited Adaptive Histogram Equalization with OpenCV to create binary image masks for training.
Mentored by Penn State Professor in regression, classification, and other unsupervised learning algorithms.
Implemented 10+ (KNN, SlopeOne, Logistic Regression, etc.) content recommendation algorithms with Sci-kit learn.
Compared accuracy (ranging from 70-90%) of ML systems by analyzing RMSE metrics. Documented findings within paper.
